title: MonoSpaced type usage.
content:
Hy everyone, in our discussions about serif and sans-serif fonts, one category we usually miss out is MonoSpaced.

Because of their consistent width property, the monospaced type does a great job in organizing computer codes and stuff.  
Are their any other monospace specific usage examples ?

 [‹ personal brand/personal typeface?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081016094854/http:/typophile.com/node/50420 "Go to previous forum topic") [Logo references w/ upper and lower case of the same letter ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081016094854/http:/typophile.com/node/50435 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nitingarg

comments.content: As a “fetish” or evocative style in advertising, films, magazines etc.
